name: Space Shooters (sidh589)
description:
Hi, Siddharth this side.

This is my final submission for Week 4 Space Shooters Game.

  1. I made some variations in the game which are listed below:-
  2. Added 3 new levels and 4 &5 are in progress. 
  3. Also added a level that can be played for infinite time.
  4. Made some variation in the background of the gameplay.
  5. Also made some variation in Main Menu.
  6. Made some changes in enemies and overall gameplay.
  7. Added different music for each level in the game.

Thanks for Reviewing!!
